# Reading

Book summaries and notes from my reading.

## Recent Reads

*No book summaries yet. Content generated by the reading assistant will appear here.*

## How This Works

Books are processed by the [Reading Assistant](/services/reading-assistant/) which generates summaries with:

- Key takeaways
- Notable quotes
- Personal notes section

All generated content starts as a draft for review before publishing.
